HERO.DESCRIPTION: Testownik is an application for learning and repeating materials. Create your own sets of questions and answers, then repeat them in the form of a quiz. Save your progress and track your results.

ITEMS.title: Strength in Numbers
ITEMS.description: Although students can gain knowledge through their own experiences, they learn most effectively by acquiring information from others. Listening, reading what others write is much more effective than studying entirely on your own.

ITEMS.title: Repetition is Key
ITEMS.description: Students who took quizzes multiple times before an exam or credit scored better than those who did not do it at all.

ITEMS.title: Don't Fear Failure
ITEMS.description: Even trying and failing is better than not trying at all. The mere attempt to recall an answer helps to consolidate the material in memory.

INFO_PICKER.TITLE: Why is it worth using our platform?
INFO_PICKER.DESCRIPTION: Get to know our features, find out why it's worth using our platform, and sign up today! And if you have any suggestions, let us know!

ITEMS.title: Knowledge
ITEMS.annotation: Learning has never been so easy, sign up today and start.

ITEMS.title: Profile
ITEMS.annotation: You don't have to worry about forgetting to study!

ITEMS.title: Save
ITEMS.annotation: Everything is saved automatically, you don't have to worry about losing progress

ITEMS.title: Search
ITEMS.annotation: Create a community, share knowledge with others

ITEMS.title: AI
ITEMS.annotation: Share your knowledge with others, create content for others
content: Edit and add your own explanations

ITEMS.title: More
ITEMS.annotation: We are open to any suggestions, contact us
content: If you have an idea or suggestion, let us know ⇩

MASTERED.TITLE: Mastered Questions
MASTERED.DESCRIPTION: Total number of questions you have mastered this week

FINISHED.TITLE: Finished Sets
FINISHED.DESCRIPTION: Total number of sets you have finished

CHART.TITLE: Your Week
CHART.DESCRIPTION: Your weekly progress in mastering questions

DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Disclaimer
DISCLAIMER.DESCRIPTION: This explanation is generated by generative artificial intelligence. It means that the answer may not be 100% accurate. Always verify the answer with more reliable sources.
